channel.title: Rage-Pkerz - 317 Pi
channel.description:
Alright guy's i just wanted to show you what i have been working on figured i would start a development thread too keep people posted at what i am working on ect...
[size=24pt][b]Base:[/b][/size] Overload x--Credits to Alex for base, ---Server looks 99.5% nothing like when i downloaded.
--Legit website, amazing looking heres some screenies: [IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/5893/tos.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/7527/topofsite.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/5296/bottemofsite.jpg[/img] Highscores [IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/2103/highscores.jpg[/img] Webclient [IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/5849/topofwebclient.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/2184/middleofweb.jpg[/img] Vote for cash [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4537/votefrcash.jpg[/img]
- Perfect Hybrid switching
- Fully Working Skilling just finished Hunter!!
-602 Animation's and Gfx
- Sexy Interfaces
- Area for Donator
- Fight pits
- Barrows
-Duel Arena
- PK Points With Rewards shop
-Overloads, Sanfew Serum Restores your special attack(Not in wild)
-Chaotic's, Primal's, Colored Whips, (Hand cannon and Korasi sword in development)
-Turmoil, Soul split they are in the normal book but i have been working on curses book( Finished curse book 100% leeches turn off when you turn turm on ect, but i can't seem to figure out headicons still trying :D )
-Bank all button :D
-All Pvp Armour
-Multi Barrage
- Npc clipping
-Money chest, Chest deep in wild for clans to fight multi combat, also a place for Hybriding the chest itself gives 800k every 3 seconds.
Bosses: *Barrel Chest -Currently one of our hardest bosses with a max of 92 And dropping chaotic's
*Corporeal Beast -Max at around 65-75 Dropping Spirit Shields
*King Black Dragon - Drops Drasonic Visage which can be used to make a Dragon fire Shield
*Tormented Demons - Drops Dragon Claws
*Kalphite Queen - Drops Dragon full helm
* Commander Zilyana - Drop's Sara Hilt and god sword shards
* General Graardor - Drops Bandos Hilt, and god sword shards
* Armadyl - Drops Armadyl Hilt and god sword shards
* New boss #1 -Drop dagon Hai robes and stuff like that
* New boss #2 - Drops Zamorak Hilt and god sword shards
More screenshot's coming soon heres what i have for now: Finished hunter skill going to spread them out through out the server soon, + add dragon imps with loots from the jars :) and work on box traps for red chins. [IMG]http://img816.imageshack.us/img816/9550/hunterh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4285/tormented.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/2023/kalphite.png[/img]
Here is a video of our barrelchest boss :) http://img694.imageshack.us/i/ygl.mp4/
HERE IS WHAT I WILL LIKE TO ADD LATER ON IN THE SERVER... IT'S A BIT LONG :P ----------------------------------------Start Server information--------------------------------------------------- Client: Headicons for curse book then it's 100% with leeches and everything... Server: There are currently some items that need fixing and stats fixed. --------------------------------------Source and client updates---------------------------------------------------- The source i use is overloadx as you can see i did a huge amount of work too it so you can tell im not like every- one else that just downloads the worlds worst source DSPK and hosts it without even editing it at all, I re added all the overloadx interfaces and they look very nice also added some other interfaces. --------------------------------------End source and client updates------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------Start gamble system----------------------------------------------------------- Idk maybe a random gamble system costs pk points or cash i don't really care post what u think? --------------------------------------End gamble-------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------START ALL SKILLS------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------START SKILLS INFORMATION---------------------------------------------------- Need to figure out how to add hunter/summoning/dung into the skill tab ----------------------------------------End SKILLS INFORMATION-----------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------Start Hunter skill--------------------------------------------------------- Ok so I added in Catching some flying npcs for hunter and you level up according too which one you catch... Now i need to change the level to catch all these npcs and add in alot of new ones including the dragon imp ect.. And work on box traps ---------------------------------------Start hunter npcs----------------------------------------------------------- 6055 Baby impling 6056 Young impling 6057 Gourmet impling 6058 Earth impling 6059 Essence impling 6060 Eclectic impling 6061 Nature impling 6062 Magpie impling 6063 Ninja impling 6064 Dragon impling 7846 Pirate impling
-----------------------------------------Start Summoning SKILL----------------------------------------------------- Summoning will basicly be collect charms from killing bosses/monsters use the charms with certain items pouches and shards too make certain summon animals and gain different amounts of exp... As for the animals they will follow you around and Help you like for instance the pack yak stores items for you..
----------------------------------------Summon pets---------------------------------------------------------------- 6794 Spirit terrorbird 6795 Spirit terrorbird 6796 Granite crab 6797 Granite crab 6798 Praying mantis 6799 Praying mantis 6800 Giant ent 6801 Giant ent 6802 Spirit cobra 6803 Spirit cobra 6804 Spirit dagannoth 6805 Spirit dagannoth 6806 Thorny snail 6807 Thorny snail 6808 Beaver 6809 Karamthulhu overlord 6810 Karamthulhu overlord 6811 Hydra 6812 Hydra 6813 Bunyip 6814 Bunyip 6815 War tortoise 6816 War tortoise 6817 Fruit bat 6818 Abyssal parasite 6819 Abyssal parasite 6820 Abyssal lurker 6821 Abyssal lurker 6822 Unicorn stallion 6823 Unicorn stallion 6824 Magpie 6825 Dreadfowl 6826 Dreadfowl 6827 Stranger plant 6828 Stranger plant 6829 Spirit wolf 6830 Spirit wolf 6831 Desert wyrm 6832 Desert wyrm 6833 Evil turnip 6834 Evil turnip 6835 Vampire bat 6836 Vampire bat 6837 Spirit scorpion 6838 Spirit scorpion 6839 Arctic bear 6840 Arctic bear 6841 Spirit spider 6842 Spirit spider 6843 Bloated leech 6844 Bloated leech 6845 Honey badger 6846 Honey badger 6847 Albino rat 6848 Albino rat 6849 Granite lobster 6850 Granite lobster 6851 Macaw 6852 Macaw 6853 Bronze minotaur 6854 Bronze minotaur 6855 Iron minotaur 6856 Iron minotaur 6857 Steel minotaur 6858 Steel minotaur 6859 Mithril minotaur 6860 Mithril minotaur 6861 Adamant minotaur 6862 Adamant minotaur 6863 Rune minotaur 6864 Rune minotaur 6865 Smoke devil 6866 Smoke devil 6867 Bull ant 6868 Bull ant 6869 Wolpertinger 6870 Wolpertinger 6871 Compost mound 6872 Compost mound 6873 Pack yak 6874 Pack yak
----------------------------------------End summon pets------------------------------------------------------------ So when a person get's 99 summoning they will be 138 combat and have the abilty to use the summoning cape :) ----------------------------------------End summon skill-----------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------Start Dungonerring SKILL-------------------------------------------------- Make floors and the person has to kill all npcs in that room then they get too go to the boss room where they kill the boss for points and exp for that skill and floor then they unlock the next floor when they get too the last floor they have all floors unlocked and can do anyone they want untill they get 99 dung and can use the awesome dungonerrning cape :P. Also with the points they have acsess to the dung shop with almost all dung items in game other then primal because that is for donators :P
Total floors making 10+ Total rooms making 20+
Floor 1:
floor 2:
floor 3:
floor 4:
floor 5:
floor 6:
floor 7:
floor 8:
floor 9:
floor 10:
--------------------End DUNG---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------Start Minigames-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------Duel Arena---------------------------------------------------------- Need to figure out how to fix the cheat engine dupe with staking, staking is currently removed so the eco doesn't get messed up this will be fixed later on. -----------------------------------------------End Duel Arena------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------Barrows------------------------------------------------------------- Just have too make it so when you click " Yess i would like to enter tunnel it teleports you too an area with a chest that gives you your reward according to your count :) ----------------------------------------------End Barrows----------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------Nazi Zombies---------------------------------------------------------- This minigame is based of off Black ops or Call of duty world at war or w/e forgot name, The runescape version will have waves of zombies spawned at you, and you have too kill them all with a group of 5 or less, the waves are endless and you gain zombie points from it too use in a zombie point shop, anyway back to the features, The minigame will be endless waves of zombies getting harder and harder and you will defeat them when you kill them you get drops such as "Castle wars tickets" You use these tickets on a chest and the chest will give you a random item or armour too help you defend yourself more from the hords of zombies comming at you Eventually you will start getting a boss in the waves that you will have to fight the boss may be disgusied as a normal zombie but you can tell its a boss when it starts hitting hard on you, the bosses will drop a different type of ticket that can be used to activate things that will help you during your fight! there will be a highscores for the teams of zombies who get too the highest wave ! :D ---------------------------------------------End Nazi Zombies------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------Start Minigame box---------------------------------------------------- Not sure if this is classified as a minigame but i thought this was a cool idea to imliment into our server, Ok to start you will teleport too a small safe zone that will show you these options Mage Melee Range Hybrid When you choose one it will give you "The best items in the server for pking " There will be a table that gives rocktails and overloads when you click it, also note that when you fight eachother you dont lose your stuff its just a fun place to fight with the best armour in the game (: i don't know if this is a good idea but you guys can let me know now on the next part you can not leave this area without clicking the portal when you click the portal it will delete all the items you got from the minigame so when you go back to the real world of the server you wont have them, if this wasn't there then it would basicly be a spawn server and that would be no fun. --------------------------------------------End minigame box-------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------Safe pk area----------------------------------------------------------- Safe area to pk you don't lose items ... --------------------------------------------End safe pk area-------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------Pk box ---------------------------------------------------------------- A box for you to pk in basicly lol.... will have a multi area in the pk box too make it more epic though :P -------------------------------------------End pk box--------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------Fight pits-------------------------------------------------------------- perfect heres info about it : You wait in waiting room with people get teleported too area where you fight eachother simple as that... :P winner gets name in waiting room as champion -------------------------------------------End fight pits----------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------Start jad--------------------------------------------------------------- one wave fight caves fight jad too his death if you win you get a fire cape -------------------------------------------End jad-----------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------End minigames------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------Start bosses-------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------Information---------------------------------------------------------------
At this point im sick of typing lololol.... I added corporeal beast, tormented demons, barrelchest, kalphite queen, king black dragon, bandos, sara, armadyl ------------------------------------------End info-----------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------New boss #1------------------------------------------------------------- Drops zammy hilt ect.... godsword shards zammy spear -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------New boss #2-------------------------------------------------------------- Drops dagon hai robes and stuff like that -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------New boss #3-------------------------------------------------------------- Will drop any type of godsword hilt/ shard/claws -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------Drops for bosses--------------------------------------------------------- *Barrel Chest -Currently one of our hardest bosses with a max of 92 And dropping chaotic's
*Corporeal Beast -Max at around 65-75 Dropping Spirit Shields
*King Black Dragon - Drops Drasonic Visage which can be used to make a Dragon fire Shield
*Tormented Demons - Drops Dragon Claws
*Kalphite Queen - Drops Dragon full helm
* Commander Zilyana - Drop's Sara Hilt and god sword shards
* General Graardor - Drops Bandos Hilt, and god sword shards
* Armadyl - Drops Armadyl Hilt and god sword shards ---------------------------------------------End drops-------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------End bosses----------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------Pking---------------------------------------------------------------------- I honestly think hybriding is almost perfect with switching and everything. ----------------------------------------End pking------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------PRICE LIST-------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------END PRICE LIST-----------------------------------------------------------------

item.description:
@Help_Fate wrote:

well considering theres Terms and agreements, they cannot go to your site, but if they somehow get pointed to this post theres pics of u using and talking about using their layout and ur understanding that its copyrighted and you have a chance of getting sued

Upside: i doubt jagex will sue over something like that, for all they know it could have been a coincidence, you never played runescape before, all you did was learned off of private servers, and make the custom layout You made yourself, riiiiight? just agree lols mopar has terms & agreements too right?

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:14, topic:384973”][quote author=razami link=topic=480739.msg3525479#msg3525479 date=1299778070]
Soulcist ur a douchebag u make everyone feel stupid on moparscape u should stop flaming on everyones project just because u probally dont even have a unique server of ur own his website looks kick ass

P.S. Can you help me with my development zaz278 because I’m trying to make a very unique server that was based off of a clean Delta and the combat style is pretty messed up there is following with u attack people but u stop following them after u use a spec do u know how I can fix that?
[/quote]
Your posts just get more idiotic by the second don’t they?

@Soul: Don’t worry mate I think everyone here who has common sense understands you were trying to help.

on topic: I wouldn’t really call this a 317, because I barely see any 317 content.

  • Fully Working Skilling just finished Hunter!!

-602 Animation’s and Gfx

-Overloads, Sanfew Serum Restores your special attack(Not in wild)

  • Commander Zilyana - Drop’s Sara Hilt and god sword shards

  • General Graardor - Drops Bandos Hilt, and god sword shards

  • Armadyl - Drops Armadyl Hilt and god sword shards

Is that 317 content?[/quote]
Eh, what would you call it then? Cause it’s a 317… Here’s base i am using.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/285639-pi-overloadx-317-a.html[quote=“razami, post:7, topic:384973”]lol nice u think u can teach me a think or to? I don’t work with PI’s I made my own source and I need help rewriting the combat so pking is better lol[/quote]
Sure when i get a chance Super busy, Spring break just started want too get a lot off that giant list of mine

I Vain I:

Good luck with the server.

Thanks! [quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:13, topic:384973”][quote author=razami link=topic=480739.msg3525479#msg3525479 date=1299778070]
Soulcist ur a douchebag u make everyone feel stupid on moparscape u should stop flaming on everyones project just because u probally dont even have a unique server of ur own his website looks kick ass
[/quote]
This is not flaming, this is simple feedback about the development and how to improve it and in this case; how to save him from being sued. Do not tell me I’m flaming.[/quote]
Ugh yea… I guess ill just do something different? … If i use everything on the site but use a different layout would that still be copyright? Or is it just there layout that is copyrighted.

item.title: Rage-Pkerz - 317 Pi
item.dc:creator: @zaz278 zaz278
item.description:
@zaz278 wrote:

Alright guy’s i just wanted to show you what i have been working on figured i would start a development thread too keep people posted at what i am working on ect…

[size=24pt]Base:[/size] Overload x–Credits to Alex for base, —Server looks 99.5% nothing like when i downloaded.

–Legit website, amazing looking heres some screenies:



Highscores

Webclient


Vote for cash

  • Perfect Hybrid switching

  • Fully Working Skilling just finished Hunter!!

-602 Animation’s and Gfx

  • Sexy Interfaces

  • Area for Donator

  • Fight pits

  • Barrows

-Duel Arena

  • PK Points With Rewards shop

-Overloads, Sanfew Serum Restores your special attack(Not in wild)

-Chaotic’s, Primal’s, Colored Whips, (Hand cannon and Korasi sword in development)

-Turmoil, Soul split they are in the normal book but i have been working on curses book( Finished curse book 100% leeches turn off when you turn turm on ect, but i can’t seem to figure out headicons still trying )

-Bank all button

-All Pvp Armour

-Multi Barrage

  • Npc clipping

-Money chest, Chest deep in wild for clans to fight multi combat, also a place for Hybriding the chest itself gives 800k every 3 seconds.

Bosses:
*Barrel Chest -Currently one of our hardest bosses with a max of 92 And dropping chaotic’s

*Corporeal Beast -Max at around 65-75 Dropping Spirit Shields

*King Black Dragon - Drops Drasonic Visage which can be used to make a Dragon fire Shield

*Tormented Demons - Drops Dragon Claws

*Kalphite Queen - Drops Dragon full helm

  • Commander Zilyana - Drop’s Sara Hilt and god sword shards

  • General Graardor - Drops Bandos Hilt, and god sword shards

  • Armadyl - Drops Armadyl Hilt and god sword shards

  • New boss #1 -Drop dagon Hai robes and stuff like that

  • New boss #2 - Drops Zamorak Hilt and god sword shards

More screenshot’s coming soon heres what i have for now:
Finished hunter skill going to spread them out through out the server soon, + add dragon imps with loots from the jars and work on box traps for red chins.

Here is a video of our barrelchest boss
http://img694.imageshack.us/i/ygl.mp4/

HERE IS WHAT I WILL LIKE TO ADD LATER ON IN THE SERVER… IT’S A BIT LONG
----------------------------------------Start Server information---------------------------------------------------
Client:
Headicons for curse book then it’s 100% with leeches and everything…
Server:
There are currently some items that need fixing and stats fixed.
--------------------------------------Source and client updates----------------------------------------------------
The source i use is overloadx as you can see i did a huge amount of work too it so you can tell im not like every-
one else that just downloads the worlds worst source DSPK and hosts it without even editing it at all, I re added
all the overloadx interfaces and they look very nice also added some other interfaces.
--------------------------------------End source and client updates------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------Start gamble system-----------------------------------------------------------
Idk maybe a random gamble system costs pk points or cash i don’t really care post what u think?
--------------------------------------End gamble-------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------START ALL SKILLS------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------START SKILLS INFORMATION----------------------------------------------------
Need to figure out how to add hunter/summoning/dung into the skill tab
----------------------------------------End SKILLS INFORMATION-----------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------Start Hunter skill---------------------------------------------------------
Ok so I added in Catching some flying npcs for hunter and you level up according too which one you catch…
Now i need to change the level to catch all these npcs and add in alot of new ones including the dragon imp ect…

-----------------------------------------Start Dungonerring SKILL--------------------------------------------------
Make floors and the person has to kill all npcs in that room then they get too go to the
boss room where they kill the boss for points and exp for that skill and floor then they unlock the next floor
when they get too the last floor they have all floors unlocked and can do anyone they want untill they get
99 dung and can use the awesome dungonerrning cape :P. Also with the points they have acsess to the dung shop
with almost all dung items in game other then primal because that is for donators

-----------------------------------------------Duel Arena----------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------Barrows-------------------------------------------------------------
Just have too make it so when you click " Yess i would like to enter tunnel it teleports you too an area with a

----------------------------------------------End Barrows----------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------Nazi Zombies----------------------------------------------------------
This minigame is based of off Black ops or Call of duty world at war or w/e forgot name,
The runescape version will have waves of zombies spawned at you, and you have too kill them all with a group of 5
or less, the waves are endless and you gain zombie points from it too use in a zombie point shop, anyway back to
the features, The minigame will be endless waves of zombies getting harder and harder and you will defeat them
when you kill them you get drops such as “Castle wars tickets” You use these tickets on a chest and the chest will
give you a random item or armour too help you defend yourself more from the hords of zombies comming at you
Eventually you will start getting a boss in the waves that you will have to fight the boss may be disgusied as a
normal zombie but you can tell its a boss when it starts hitting hard on you, the bosses will drop a different
type of ticket that can be used to activate things that will help you during your fight! there will be a highscores
for the teams of zombies who get too the highest wave !
---------------------------------------------End Nazi Zombies------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------Start Minigame box----------------------------------------------------
Not sure if this is classified as a minigame but i thought this was a cool idea to imliment into our server,
Ok to start you will teleport too a small safe zone that will show you these options
Mage
Melee
Range
Hybrid
When you choose one it will give you "The best items in the server for pking " There will be a table that gives
rocktails and overloads when you click it, also note that when you fight eachother you dont lose your stuff
its just a fun place to fight with the best armour in the game (: i don’t know if this is a good idea but you guys
can let me know now on the next part you can not leave this area without clicking the portal when you click the
portal it will delete all the items you got from the minigame so when you go back to the real world of the server
you wont have them, if this wasn’t there then it would basicly be a spawn server and that would be no fun.
--------------------------------------------End minigame box-------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------Drops for bosses---------------------------------------------------------
*Barrel Chest -Currently one of our hardest bosses with a max of 92 And dropping chaotic’s

*Corporeal Beast -Max at around 65-75 Dropping Spirit Shields

*King Black Dragon - Drops Drasonic Visage which can be used to make a Dragon fire Shield

*Tormented Demons - Drops Dragon Claws

*Kalphite Queen - Drops Dragon full helm

  • Commander Zilyana - Drop’s Sara Hilt and god sword shards
